statements: SELECT * FROM task_list;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM task_list WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM task_list ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_list WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name FROM task_list WHERE task_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description, deadline FROM task_list WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT * FROM task_list WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%' OR task_name LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY task_id ASC
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM task_list WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY task_id DESC
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM task_list WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY task_name ASC
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM task_list WHERE task_name = 'Important Task' ORDER BY task_id ASC
SELECT * FROM TaskList;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM TaskList WHERE task_deadline >= '2022-10-15';
SELECT project_name, deadline_date FROM ProjectDeadlines;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_deadline FROM TaskList WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TaskList ORDER BY task_deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM TaskList WHERE task_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TaskList ORDER BY task_deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_deadline FROM TaskList INNER JOIN ProjectDeadlines ON TaskList.task_id = ProjectDeadlines.project_id WHERE ProjectDeadlines.deadline_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM TaskList WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT task_name, task_deadline FROM TaskList WHERE task_deadline BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline_date DESC
SELECT project_name FROM projects WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31'
SELECT task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT user_id, task_id, start_date FROM user_tasks
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE deadline_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline_date FROM tasks JOIN user_tasks ON tasks.task_id = user_tasks.task_id WHERE user_id = 123 AND start_date > '2022-02-01'
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM user_tasks WHERE user_id = 456)
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN user_tasks ON tasks.task_id = user_tasks.task_id WHERE tasks.task_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY user_tasks.start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM task_lists;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM task_lists WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, task_id, completed FROM user_tasks WHERE user_id = 1 AND completed = true;
SELECT * FROM task_lists;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM task_lists ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM projects JOIN user_tasks ON projects.project_id = user_tasks.task_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM daily_tasks;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM daily_tasks WHERE deadline IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM daily_tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT assignment_id, task_id, project_id, assigned_to FROM tasks_assigned ORDER BY project_id, task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM daily_tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM daily_tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL AND deadline > '2022-06-01';
SELECT task_id, assigned_to FROM tasks_assigned WHERE project_id = 3 AND assigned_to LIKE 'John%';
SELECT task_name, percentage_complete FROM daily_tasks JOIN task_progress ON daily_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id WHERE percentage_complete < 100 ORDER BY percentage_complete DESC;
